property.name: armclang_cl_enable_debug_info
property.long: Specifies whether symbolic debug information is generated.

property.name: armclang_cl_cpu
property.long: Select the processor variant for compiler

property.name: armclang_cl_fpu
property.long: Select the FPU architecture for the compiler

property.name: armasm_cl_cpu
property.long: Select the architecture or processor variant for the assembler and linker

property.name: armasm_cl_fpu
property.long: Select the FPU architecture for the assembler and linker
